entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (itp_loam_courier.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_32: Inquisitor Loam sent you! No! There was nothing I could do. They came out of nowhere and took the missive. There were too many. Wait, I know. You can go take care of them. Teach them a lesson about messing with an Imperial courier. That's my only hope.
entries.s_34: Huh...what was that? Please go away. He might find me.
